Title: Provides school preference when a student is applying to the same public elementary or middle school as a sibling
Summary: Provides that in a city with a population of one million or more, where a student is applying to attend a public elementary or middle school and such student has a sibling who already attends such school, such student whose application is pending shall be given preference for admission.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing school application preference when a student is applying to the same public elementary or middle school as a sibling
